org.agreement_technologies.service.map_heuristic

Class DTGHeuristic.TransitionCostRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agreement_technologies.service.map_heuristic.DTGHeuristic.TransitionCostRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    DTGHeuristic

    public static class DTGHeuristic.TransitionCostRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    TransitionCostRequest defined a request to other agent to get the estimated cost of a value transition for a given variable.
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Builds a new transition cost request.
        Parameters:
        varName - Name of the variable
        prevValue - Initial value
        nextValue - End value
        agentName - Destination agent
        prevTcr - Request that caused this new request
        requestId - Identifier code for this request
